metadata.description: Used to set the Keyvault access policy - run this command using az cli to get your ObjectID : az ad signed-in-user show --query objectId -o tsv
Set the resource group name, this will be created automatically
AKS network Plugin - kubenet or CNI
Choose AKS Cluster Type (this is used to define kubectl access mode)
Set the size for the supporting VMs (domain controller, hub DNS, VPN VM etc)
Set the name of the domain eg contoso.local

subnetRef.value: [format('{0}/subnets/{1}', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('ResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}', variables('env')[variables('networkPlugin')].vnets[0].vnetName))).outputs.vnid.value, reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('ResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}', variables('env')[variables('networkPlugin')].vnets[0].vnetName))).outputs.subnets.value[1].name)]

subnet1ref.value: [format('{0}/subnets/{1}', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('ResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}', variables('env')[variables('networkPlugin')].vnets[0].vnetName))).outputs.vnid.value, reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('ResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}', variables('env')[variables('networkPlugin')].vnets[0].vnetName))).outputs.subnets.value[0].name)]

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [if(parameters('deployVpn'), format('sh cse.sh {0} {1} {2} {3} {4} {5} {6}', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces', format('{0}pip', variables('nicName'))), '2020-06-01').ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', format('{0}-{1}', variables('nicName'), parameters('publicIPAddressNameSuffix'))), '2020-06-01').ipAddress, parameters('vpnVars').gwip, parameters('vpnVars').gwaddressPrefix, parameters('vpnVars').psk, parameters('vpnVars').onpremAddressPrefix, parameters('vpnVars').spokeAddressPrefix), '')]

vnetSubnetID.value: [format('{0}/subnets/{1}', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('ResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}', variables('env')[variables('networkPlugin')].vnets[1].vnetName))).outputs.vnid.value, reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('ResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}', variables('env')[variables('networkPlugin')].vnets[1].vnetName))).outputs.subnets.value[0].name)]
